# Advanced Setup

Use this page to test React components in MDX.

<MyComponent name="OpenTrans User">
  The text inside this component should be translated, but the tags should stay.
</MyComponent>

### Mathematical Logic
The complexity of the translation can be represented as:

$$
O(n \times m)
$$

Where $n$ is the number of files and $m$ is the average file size.
